title: Any Teams recruiting?
body: Hi im a level 21 LOL player looking for a team to join i main akali, and can also play a pretty mean fizz. I can basically play any where except support but will strive to improve if need be. I have been playing with level 30 friends since i started and have become a very strong player becasue of this. I am trying to reach level 30 as fast as i can and will play ranked asap. please comment if you are willing to take me in.

replies.body: add slaya i would definitely consider having you in a team im making once you are level 30
ok thank you is it just slaya nothing else
